title: Material Existence Substantive Procedures
content: Standard MESP workflow starts with scope alignment, lists client populations, performs sample extraction, maps evidence to controls, and drafts workpapers for review.

title: Risk Assessment with Fraud Overlay
content: Risk engagements analyze inherent risk, residual risk after control testing, and include fraud specific decision points that route to investigations when anomalies exceed thresholds.

title: Compliance Evidence Collection
content: Compliance workflows emphasize gathering regulatory evidence, tagging documents with citations, running automated checks, and compiling compliance memos for sign-off.
